text: Dendrolimus spectabilis, the pine moth or matsugahera in Japan, is a moth in the family Lasiocampidae.Japan Times Straw belts October 16, 2015 Retrieved March 19, 2015 ==Distribution== It is found in Japan. ==Host plants and damage== The Japanese straw mats named komomaki were created to protect pine trees from the moth.Japan Times Straw belts October 16, 2015 Retrieved March 23, 2015 ==References== Category:Lasiocampidae Category:Moths described in 1877 Category:Moths of Japan
title: Dendrolimus spectabilis
